name: Global Research Conference on Laser, Optics and Photonics
content: On behalf of Foster Research Organizing Committee, we are delighted to preside over a three-day “Global Research Conference on Laser, Optics and Photonics” (EGRCLOP2024) focusing on the theme “Ameliorating and Unveiling the insights in Lasers, Optics and Photonic Technologies” which will be taking place during August 26-28, 2024 at Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
